ProjectTitle: New tools to model Photochemistry in the Long timescale (PhotoLong)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/07/2024
Dear,

This is a very good dmp. Two very small remarks:
-	Both Zenodo and RDR will automatically generate a DOI when you upload a dataset so you could answer yes on the question asking whether you use a DOI.
-	The size of the dataset matters, both RDR and Zenodo put limits on the size, but this is often negotiable.

Mark Verbrugge
label: good with suggestions
